phrases: Would you stop snarling at each other every time you meet?
It is her fault for glaring at me!
I guess there is no stopping it when you tried to kill each other the moment you met.
No, we did not try to kill each other at first.
We did not start that when we first met.
What was your first meeting like, then?
I heard there might be a civil war soon.
The royal succession dispute is finally coming to a head.
At this rate the neighboring country's going to capitalize on it.
Every time they open their mouths, it is about some conflict.
Do they have no intention of enjoying their worthless lives?
It is the priestess of the holy seas!
She is come to our town, too!
Lately she is been intervening in human conflicts and resolving them.
If the conflict is over water or food,
she creates lakes and causes abundant harvests.
If they clash, she makes them lose their will to fight with her miraculous power.
She must be a god or something on par with them...
Either way, it is against the rules for them to interfere in human society.
Well, let us see what she is like.
She is neither god nor divine messenger!
But if that is the case, is she just fooling around?!
What do you think you are doing?
A dragon acting as a miraculous priestess?
I could ask you the same thing.
What is the Emperor of Demise's daughter doing in a human village?
Your name is Tohru, if I remember right?
I just believe that humans should not fight each other,
and it is foolish to spill unnecessary blood.
I have the power to stop that, so I do.
So you are actually doing work, unlike the other lazy harmony dragons.
I bet you have had quite a few human sacrifices offered to you.
I do not need any human sacrifices.
Why would anyone say humans are tasty to eat?
I am sure there are much tastier things in this world.
It is my belief that humans will create them.
She is the oddball Quetzalcoatl mentioned.
So what, you ask for food in return?
You sure you are not better suited to the chaos faction?
You sound like a bit of an oddball yourself.
None of the chaos dragons I have met thus far were willing to engage in conversation.
I just slotted the act of judging you in before destroying you.
Would you like to accompany me for a while, then?
Let us both judge the world of humans together.
So you two traveled together for a while?
I went along with her self-righteousness for a bit.
I must have been crazy at the time.
So you were both feeling each other out, then?
Going around without pushing too hard as two people with different value sets.
I guess you could say that?
I was more interested in Elma
than the goals of our species, since she was doing as she pleased.
At least, I think that is how it was at the time.
We came to understand one another, so...
We could not see eye to eye, so after a few decades naturally we...
That is not natural at all.
Why did you destroy the palace?!
This was supposed to be a symbol of peace!
The thought of a peace requiring you gave me the chills.
This palace was erected to worship you as a god.
From it, a religion centered around you took root
and adopted a class-based society full of disparity.
In time there would come to be conflict with those who refused to accept you.
You are not listening to what I am trying to say.
Did you intend to remain here with these humans for all eternity?
Granting the desires of others and acting as a symbol of worship forever?
I am asking you if you wanted to let yourself get dragged into those humans' framework
when you thought were operating under your own.
You have diverged from your original intentions, Elma!
I cannot stand how disgraceful you have become.
So I will kill you and wake those humans from their dream.
Try to kill me, if you can!
I knew it, too, you know.
This was not going in a good direction.
But what else could I do?
The food they brought me was just so delicious!
That was how we conclusively broke apart.
That sounds both grand and petty.
In the end, I returned to the harmony faction's base
and did not get involved with humans again.
So you two got along so well, you could fight.
Miss Kobayashi, did you listen to any of our story just now?
We are completely at odds with each other!
and you have your hands too full with work to try to lead humanity.
Would not that mean you have no reason to fight here?
Do you not understand why things are like that here?
Because the food here is delicious!
Both Tohru and I are gluttons!
I really will not ever get along with you!
You are always easily enticed by food!
But tasting human culture is the best way to understand humans!
You just want to stuff your face!
You are totally hooked on human food yourself!
They are so close they understand each other's inner thoughts,
Day after day, you are cooking food!
Never tiring of it, always in your maid outfit!
You are always in your office attire, even on your days off, too!
and they fight to shave away the parts they cannot accept.
Do not act like that is the same as your unnatural appearance!
I always wanted friends like that myself.
Together With You (Well, If We Get Along)
Day after day you laze about!
Why do not you go work a bit?!
I have been thinking about my future.
Do not think about it on a dragon's scale!
I will help you with your work for now, then.
There is no way you could handle the work of a maid!
That is what Kobayashi is always saying to you.
She is earning money for your food costs, too.
At the same place as Kobayashi, then.
Why are you bringing Elma up?
Would you like to search for a place that will employ you, then?
Using our PC or reading the classifieds?
No, I will look and decide for myself.
Oborozuka Shopping District, Full of Smiles Every Day
Shop at Your Local Shopping District!
It is my first time passing through here.
I always went over the roofs.
Are you sure you would not better off living in the wild?
Well, I will admit that you have been putting in effort lately.
And at some point you managed to form proper hands.
I kind of like you like this.
Hmph, do not say such things so suddenly.
T-Shirts Dress Shirts Suits Special Price
But I still like Kobayashi the most.
Have you found something you would like to try doing?
Meat and fish make me want to devour them.
As expected from a fellow chaos dragon.
Flowers make me want to trample them.
It is our destiny to destroy.
Books make me want to burn them.
It is forbidden to do all those things here, though.
I hate those kinds of instinctual things.
Well, we are here because we denied them.
That means there is nowhere you can work, though.
So these ladies are friends of yours, Kanna-chan?
We were searching for a part-time job, but...
Kanna-chan, this would look good on you.
I have not seen you before.
Are you the maid's little sister?
So this is your shop, Ms. Aida?
We have met often at the neighborhood association meetings.
Oh, what happened to your leg?
Oh, I messed it up while jogging.
I am getting old now, so I have been thinking of closing up shop.
But as you can see, I just cannot.
There are a lot of kids here.
That is because we are a candy shop.
Different children have been coming here for decades now.
She is the same age as me.
I was thinking of letting my grandson run the shop,
but I guess it would be better to have someone
enthusiastic about it than someone reluctant to do it.
I would ask you to let her, as well.
Working part time at a candy store, huh?
Do you know about it, Kobayashi?
It is at the end of the shopping district, right?
She got hired thanks to my voice of authority.
She displayed firm command of her emotions,
and I thought she was terrifying.
You chose it because you were interested in it, right?
I started my job with vague feelings and found things that made it fulfilling, too.
So I think that is a fine way to start work.
I am a maid because I was interested in it, too, and it is very fulfilling!
Make sure you listen to others and learn your tasks properly.
Do not let yourself be like this maid.
So you are stuck helping out?
Apparently she hired someone, so she just asked me to support them to start.
That stubborn old woman hired someone outside the family.
I am taking a uniform over today,
but get a look at this.
It is sized for an adult man.
I have no idea where she met him.
If he is some weirdo, I am chasing him out.
What the heck are they like?
That is what we are telling people.
Going by the name... you are a foreigner?
asked her to let me work, and she hired me.
That was decided way too easily.
She has to have some ulterior motive for suddenly wanting to work here like this.
So, what are you here for?
An apron and a white shirt.
Do not act ashamed while rolling up your shirt!
Oh, that is how it is.
Does she come from a country with that kind of culture?
I cannot get the buttons on this closed.
Y-You will be fine like that.
You are a pervert, are not you?
I will be back here, so ask if there is anything you do not understand.
She is a weirdo in a different way!
I am surprised Grandma decided to hire such a mysterious person.
She makes way less sense than someone with ulterior motives and it is scary.
Can she even do the work?
She is actually trying to do an honest job.
Even more so than I would, huh?
Is that why Grandma hired her?
Why do you have such big breasts?
An elementary schooler's blazing fastball of innocent sexual harassment!
They are big so they can hold fire.
What kind of nonsense deflection is that?!
Do they make your shoulders stiff?
Hmm, would you like to hold them?
Hey, do not do anything weird!
Why is your reaction so delayed?!
But I cannot play while I am working.
So I wanted to work somewhere where children have fun.
It is time to close up shop.
Want to play for a bit?
I will show you how to spin the top.
Looks like I will not have to worry about Grandma.
Apparently humans make wishes on stars.
Apparently they pray to stars for peace,
bountiful harvests, and happiness for themselves and their families.
So they do not care who grants their wishes, as long as they are granted?
If your wish could come true.
You would probably just wish for lots of delicious food to eat, right?
You know me well, do not you?
I would wish for your share of delicious food, too.
Our lunch break is too short!
Do not you agree, Miss Kobayashi?!
Lately there is five places I want to visit for lunch,
but I can only hit two of them!
Normal people would not go to multiple places!
Uncanny Relationships (One Side Is a Dragon)
You might get tired from heavy breasts
It helps to rest them on your desk.
I am glad mine are small.
